title: The Blood and Light Vampire Series
description: This omnibus contains all SIX novels and TWO shorts.It totals 2800 pages of work.Rue lives in the quiet little town of Calvary, Minnesota.Located along the Great lakes and nestled in lush forests.Safe, secure, home, or so she thought.Nightmares plague her dreams. A boy, an ominous prediction. A change is coming, and not for the better.Vampires, angels, and demons.Love, loss, and redemption.Some journeys begin at forever.
author: Rue Volley
